actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to transfer certain airspace for use for housing purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to transfer airspace over public buildings of the United States for use for low and moderate income housing and for low-rent housing.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to transfer certain airspace for use for housing purposes.
